content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Infrared Thermometers reduce risk by measuring the body’s temperature without making physical contact. This lowers the possibility of cross-contamination and minimizes the risk of spreading disease.

  • FDA and CE approved
  • Measures body temperature without physical contact
  • Non-contact approach reduces the risk of spreading disease between people being evaluated
  • Easy to use, clean, and disinfect
  • Measures temperature and displays a reading rapidly, can retake a temperature reading quickly

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”73940,73941″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1592592785868{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Infrared Thermometer

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Infrared thermometers are temperature sensing devices that use electromagnetic radiation to make non-contact surface temperature readings. This allows for fast, touchless measurements from a safe distance. Non-contact infrared thermometers reduce cross-contamination risk and minimize the risk of spreading disease.

Part # 203-005[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dc035-e168a728-5eff”][vc_column_text]Our infrared thermometers FDA and CE approved.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
